General.Name: Pardes Biosciences Inc
General.Description: Pardes Biosciences, Inc., a clinical stage biopharmaceutical company, focuses on discovering, developing, and commercializing novel therapeutics to treat and prevent viral diseases. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is headquartered in Carlsbad, California. As of August 31, 2023, Pardes Biosciences, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of MediPacific, Inc.
General.Address: 2173 Salk Avenue, Carlsbad, CA, United States, 92008
